#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
#define For(i, a, b) for(int i=a; i<b; i++)
#define ffi For(i, 0, N+1)
#define ffj For(j, 0, N+1)
#define ffa ffi ffj
#define w cout
#define e "\n"
//#define int ll
const ll MAXN = 2001, MOD = 1000000007;

main() {
	//ifstream cin ("test.in");
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0); cin.tie(0);
	cin >> T;
	For (t, 0, T) {
        cin >> N;
        w<< out[N]<<e;
	}
}
